children.text: RoadRecorder is an application dedicated to all drivers. It records your trip in video files, including sound. It can also record GPS position and allows you to replay your trip videos with location tracking.
RoadRecorder supports loop recording with automatic file deletion to save your memory card space.
The application is very useful in case of fender-bender, car accident or any other unusual situation on the road; RoadRecorder registers location, date, time, speed along with video and audio data.
RoadRecorder is your black box in every trip! Have a safe journey!
PRO Version already in Google Play!

• no ads 
• unlimited recording length 
• multiple files within a session recordings 
• unlimited number of pictures per minute 
• more frequent updates 
• full support for events (sending and receiving from apps like Tasker) 
• the ability to send video file with coordinates (Dropbox, e-mail, etc.) 
• geotagging photos
